title: Beating China at its Own Game
description: Led an entrepreneurship accelerator program in Ludhiana, helping local manufacturers compete globally. Highlight story: Worked with AStar Clothing to develop India's first locally manufactured baby sleeping bags, competing successfully with Chinese imports on both cost and quality. Impact: 100% business growth in one year, reduced employee attrition, and created new manufacturing capabilities in India.

title: IT Innovation in Punjab
description: Mentored IT entrepreneurs in Ludhiana through GAME's accelerator program, focusing on building sustainable tech businesses. Key achievement: Helped transform traditional businesses with modern IT solutions, enabling local entrepreneurs to compete in the digital economy while maintaining their cultural identity and values.

title: Steel Industry Transformation
description: Worked with steel manufacturing entrepreneurs to modernize operations and scale businesses. Notable success: Guided steel manufacturers in adopting innovative practices, improving operational efficiency, and expanding market reach. Focus on sustainable growth and modern manufacturing practices.
